name: • Life - Thoughts 1 •
description: Sometimes I feel like going further, life is a great gift, especially if you know what you want to do, but I have another equally disruptive thought, life becomes fun and exciting if you know what you have to do?  It sounds easy to understand, but there is nothing further from it, understanding what your purpose in the world is goes far beyond simply choosing a career or tomorrow's clothes, it's something more akin to motivation, at least on a large scale....  But what is really finding your purpose, how much could a 16 year old tell you about life? maybe just my point of view, a real and sincere one, a simple midnight reflection...  For me finding your purpose goes beyond what you have to do for the rest of your life, purpose is much more subjective than that, it is a feeling, it is feeling deep down that you are doing the right thing, it is feeling fulfilled with what you are doing, loving yourself and loving the world, without regrets, living in an exciting way (according to your meaning of exciting) and never stopping learning, valuing the small details...
